title: Garda to take light touch in enforcing new coronavirus measures
description: Further prison restrictions announced to stem spread of Covid-19 virus
content:
Gardaí are to use a mixture of persuasion and existing public order legislation to enforce social distancing protocols outlined by Taoiseach Leo Varadkar on Tuesday in order to combat coronavirus.
The Taoiseach said gatherings of more than four people outsid… [+167 chars]
